SELECT vlrl_pk, vlrl_padre_pk, vlrl_vlrc_pk, vlrl_rgla_pk , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_impuesto_prmt_pk ELSE (SELECT vlrl_impuesto_prmt_pk FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_impuesto_prmt_pk , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_ssrv_pk ELSE (SELECT vlrl_ssrv_pk FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_ssrv_pk , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_fini ELSE (SELECT vlrl_fini FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_fini , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_ffin ELSE (SELECT vlrl_ffin FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_ffin
, (SELECT SUM(vlrd_cuant1) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk) AS vlrl_cuant1 , (SELECT SUM(vlrd_cuant2) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk) AS vlrl_cuant2 , (SELECT SUM(vlrd_cuant3) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk) AS vlrl_cuant3 , (SELECT SUM(vlrd_cuant4) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk) AS vlrl_cuant4 , (SELECT SUM(vlrd_cuant5) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk) AS vlrl_cuant5 , (SELECT SUM(vlrd_cuant6) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk) AS vlrl_cuant6
, CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_info1 ELSE (SELECT vlrl_info1 FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_info1 , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_info2 ELSE (SELECT vlrl_info2 FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_info2 , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_info3 ELSE (SELECT vlrl_info3 FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_info3 , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_info4 ELSE (SELECT vlrl_info4 FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_info4 , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_info5 ELSE (SELECT vlrl_info5 FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_info5 , CASE WHEN vlrl_pk = vlrl_padre_pk THEN vlrl_info6 ELSE (SELECT vlrl_info6 FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrlPadre WHERE vlrlPadre.vlrl_pk = vlrl.vlrl_padre_pk) END AS vlrl_info6
, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vlrd_importe_base) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk), 0) AS vlrl_importe_base , COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vlrd_importe) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk), 0) AS vlrl_importe , COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = vlrl_pk), 0) AS vlrl_vlrd_count , (CASE WHEN rgla_tipo = 'T' THEN ( SELECT SUM(vlrd_importe) FROM tbl_valoracion_det_vlrd WHERE vlrd_vlrl_pk = ANY ( SELECT vlrl_pk FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl aux WHERE aux.vlrl_padre_pk = vlrl.vlrl_pk ) ) ELSE NULL END) AS vlrl_subtotal
, vlrc_fref AS vlrl_fref , vlrc_srvc_pk
, rgla_codigo, rgla_crgo_pk, rgla_tipo, rgla_enti_pk
, rglv_valor_base , rglv_etiq_info1, rglv_etiq_info2, rglv_etiq_info3, rglv_etiq_info4, rglv_etiq_info5, rglv_etiq_info6 , rglv_etiq_cuant1, rglv_etiq_cuant2, rglv_etiq_cuant3, rglv_etiq_cuant4, rglv_etiq_cuant5, rglv_etiq_cuant6
, prmt_parametro AS vlrl_impuesto_prmt , prmt_tppr_pk AS vlrl_impuesto_tppr_pk
, (SELECT ssrv_numero FROM tbl_subservicio_ssrv WHERE ssrv_pk = vlrl_ssrv_pk) AS ssrv_numero , (SELECT crgo_codigo FROM tbl_cargo_crgo WHERE crgo_pk = rgla_crgo_pk) AS crgo_codigo , (SELECT enti_tipo FROM tbl_entidad_enti WHERE enti_pk = rgla_enti_pk) AS enti_tipo
, (SELECT crgv_es_temporal FROM tbl_cargo_version_crgv WHERE crgv_crgo_pk = rgla_crgo_pk AND vlrc_fref BETWEEN crgv_fini AND COALESCE(crgv_ffin, vlrc_fref)) AS crgv_es_temporal
, ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_lang = #{idioma} AND i18n_pref = 'prvr' AND i18n_ext_pk = ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = vlrl_impuesto_prmt_pk AND vlrc_fref BETWEEN prvr_fini AND COALESCE(prvr_ffin, vlrc_fref) ) ) AS p18n_texto , ( SELECT i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n WHERE i18n_pref = 'rglv' AND i18n_ext_pk = rglv_pk AND i18n_lang = #{idioma} ) AS rgla_texto
FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl vlrl INNER JOIN tbl_valoracion_vlrc ON vlrc_pk = vlrl_vlrc_pk INNER JOIN tbl_regla_rgla rgla ON rgla_pk = vlrl_rgla_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_regla_version_rglv ON rglv_rgla_pk = vlrl_rgla_pk AND vlrc_fref BETWEEN rglv_fini AND COALESCE(rglv_ffin, vlrc_fref) LEFT JOIN tbl_parametro_prmt ON prmt_pk = vlrl_impuesto_prmt_pk
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_valoracion_lin_vlrl INNER JOIN tbl_valoracion_vlrc ON vlrc_pk = vlrl_vlrc_pk INNER JOIN tbl_regla_rgla ON rgla_pk = vlrl_rgla_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_parametro_prmt ON prmt_pk = vlrl_impuesto_prmt_pk LEFT JOIN tbl_regla_version_rglv ON rglv_rgla_pk = vlrl_rgla_pk

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tbl_regla_rgla WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_regla_version_rglv WHERE rglv_rgla_pk = rgla_pk AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_valoracion_vlrc WHERE vlrc_fref BETWEEN rglv_fini AND COALESCE(rglv_ffin, vlrc_fref) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_aspecto_version_aspv WHERE aspv_aspc_pk = vlrc_aspc_pk AND vlrc_fref BETWEEN aspv_fini AND COALESCE(aspv_ffin, vlrc_fref) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_aspecto_cargo_ascr WHERE ascr_aspc_pk = aspv_aspc_pk AND ascr_crgo_pk = rgla_crgo_pk ) ) AND vlrc_pk = #{vlrcId}
) ) AND rgla_pk = #{rgla.id}
